img_above_text:
### Mind Core Location 6
The next Mind Core is located along the Fright Cliff \- Squall Hideout Shrine path in Yellow Wind Ridge. From the Shrine, on your right, you can find a small hill.
img_below_text:
Head up it and defeat the enemies to find a chest at the back with the resource.
![Mind Core - Squall Hideout 2.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f1/Mind_Core_-_Squall_Hideout_2.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a player character in a rugged, rocky landscape, likely from the game "Black Myth: Wukong." The character is positioned on a path surrounded by dry vegetation and towering cliffs. The preceding text indicates that this location is along the Fright Cliff - Squall Hideout Shrine path in Yellow Wind Ridge, where players are instructed to head up a small hill to defeat enemies and find a chest containing a Mind Core resource. The image serves to visually guide players on the path they need to take to reach the Mind Core location.
